mapper.select: SELECT * FROM dcf_basket, dcf_product WHERE dcf_basket.basket_pd_idx = dcf_product.product_idx and basket_user_idx = #{ param1 } ORDER BY ROWNUM ASC
SELECT NVL(SUM(product_price*basket_count),0) FROM dcf_product, dcf_basket WHERE dcf_basket.basket_pd_idx = dcf_product.product_idx and basket_user_idx = #{ param1 }
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM dcf_basket WHERE basket_idx = #{ param1 }
DELETE FROM dcf_basket WHERE (ROWNUM, basket_idx) = (SELECT ROWNUM, basket_idx FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as rn, basket_idx FROM dcf_basket WHERE basket_user_idx = #{ param1 }) WHERE rn = #{ param2 })
mapper.update: UPDATE dcf_basket SET basket_count = basket_count +1 WHERE (ROWNUM, basket_idx) = (SELECT ROWNUM, basket_idx FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as rn, basket_idx FROM dcf_basket WHERE basket_user_idx = #{ param1 }) WHERE rn = #{ param2 })

UPDATE dcf_basket SET basket_count = basket_count -1 WHERE (ROWNUM, basket_idx) = (SELECT ROWNUM, basket_idx FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as rn, basket_idx FROM dcf_basket WHERE basket_user_idx = #{ param1 }) WHERE rn = #{ param2 }) and basket_count ^= 1
